description: Born from a vision of providing an authentic Southeast Asian street food experience to the citizens of The Triangle, Buddhalicious does just that, with food that is as delectably dazzling and vibrant as the truck itself. Sampling from the cuisine of each of the countries in the ASEAN Organization, (Burnei, Laos, Cambodia, Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, Myanmar, Indonesia, Singapore and the Philippines), Buddhalicious’s menu offers an eclectic selection of flavorful dishes that the people of South Carolina adore.Folks are raving about the succulently sweet & spicy Thai Sugarcane Shrimp and the luscious Lemongrass Beef. A Durham health inspector has even stated that Buddhalicious was one of his favorite eats on the job. Welcome Buddhalicious into your Buddha belly and send your taste buds off on an exotic adventure to delicious places.
name: Buddhalicious
